column7: Finally a place where you can get good dumplings
column9: This is a small place down in a cellar. It is really not a place where you sit down and eat. You order and take the food with you. But the dumplings are superb! If you haven't been there yet go there. I am sure...More
The place is really small, just a few places to sit. Can be crowded at lunchtime. Recommend take away. Very nice food, different choices.

column7: Best value for money in town
column9: The portion sizes are so big, I usually take the accompanying rice/noodles home. Soup is a delight, and the choices of sauces are fun to explore. Usually eat there once or twice a week! A resident of the town, would recommend this place over any...More
The food is so tasty ❤️ I can’t believe I spent so little money on such big portion. It was fantastic
Haven't eaten dumplings for ages. This is as authentic as you can get in Europe. The price is also extremely good. There is always a long line at noon. Highly recommended.

column7: A nice change from the usual sushi/thai
column9:
Lund is one of those university towns that is most affected by food trends. Now when sushi and thai are "in", the town is flooded with those. That is why it is refreshing with a place like Fengssons which do something different.  
Dumpling and Dim...More

Have been going to Fengssons since they opened! They are very friendly and standards have kept the same. Great value for money! 
Their chili sauce is amazing! I always ask for extra... their coconut soup is refreshing

这家煎饺店就在法学院后门出来二十米，好像是四川人开的。门面不太起眼，要往地下走。店里面也很小，只有几张桌子。但人气一直挺旺的。

饺子的话，我吃过的有猪肉、鸡肉、素菜，可以随意组合，10个69克朗，15个89克朗。除此之外还可以在米饭、面条、米粉中选一个主食，再选一个蘸饺子的酱料，价钱包括在内。提供免费的汤，味道很像冬阴功。

饺子的味道还是可以的，个人喜欢稍微焦一点的，口感比较脆。素菜的那个做得有点面，以致我再也没尝试过第二次。最推荐面条米粉配的那个酱料，和上面撒的花生脆，真的好吃。

除了堂食，食物也可以打包带走，每一个都有单独的盒子，餐具自取，很方便。

感觉老板娘对自家食物和服务的质量要求都挺高的，每次去都听到她不是在数落这个店员就是在数落那个。希望他们的饺子能一直保持好的品质...

For dumplings, you can choose from pork, chicken and vegan, as you like, with rice or noodles as well as a sauce. Free soup. 69kr for 10. 89kr for 15. Taste is fine. Noodles are delicious.

The restaurant is rather...More
We were craving for fresh dumplings for lunch and got what we were looking for. The level of service was also good. Value for money.

If we crave asian style food and dumplings, we visit this place in Lund. Price quality ratio is very good, at least in my opinion and for the Swedish / Lund scene. My favourite dumplings are the pork dumplings with the Szechuan pepper sauce. The...More

column7: Very good dumplings at a reasonable price
column9: I had an early dinner / late lunch here on a Saturday, before the interesting football matches kicked off. I had 15 dumplings with rice noodles, and took the modig and original sauces. The modig one was much more to my taste though both were...More

column7: GENUINE dumplings you can get in Lund.
column9: I'm native Chinese from Northeast where people consume lots of dumplings. The dumplings of Fengssons are GENUINE dumplings. They are made recently by hand of the chefs, not the pre-made frozen ones using meat stock from Vietnam war era that many restaurants in Sweden usually...More
Although serving dumplings(I recommend the pork filling), she has this pulled pork dish that is well-cooked and seasoned. Good value for money too.

column7: Finally an authentic Asian kitchen in Lund!
column9: Finally we have received an authentic Asian kitchen in Lund. This little "take-away/a few tables around" kitchen specializing in dumplings is a pure delight. You feel you are in a little hole-in-the-wall in HongKong full with activity and flavours everywhere. The dumplings are really good...More
Lovely homemade dumplings (pork, chicken or veg) with rice, noodles or rice noodles served with a choice of 3 different types of sauce. Great service & perfect for take away.

column7: Jiao ze as it should taste like.
column9: Jiao ze is a sort of dumpling maily eaten in the north as I understand it and I don't associate it with the south Chinese "dim sum"/"Yum cha" Zongze or Baoze that I mainly find in the north too. (I might be wrong, but it's...More
Small cozy place where a family runs the dumpling business at a very affordable price and the best quality ever. If you are lucky you can get a table outside in the sun.

Stayed in Lund for half a year for exchange and ive got to say that this place was our go-to when we were tired of cooking at home or the exorbitant food prices elsewhere. Cheap and good food, and really filling as well. The owners...More

Simple menu with 3 kinds of dumplings, and you can chose any combination of fillings. Separate container of noodles, rice or rice noodles. Choice of 4 dipping sauces. Meant to be take away, but there are a few seats inside and several tables on the...More
Tasty cheap food, fast service, just like eating at a fast food place in Asia.   Will come back again. Huge portions freshly cooked. No frills value for money
A hole in the street, serving just fantastik noodles and panfried dumplings. Fast, simple and great!

Made a pit stop for lunch at this restaurant in Lund on our way to Stockholm.  Didn't expect much but the quick diner spot was a pleasant surprise for our hungry family. Choice of 3 types of dumplings with accompanying rice or noodles. A free...More
15 pan fried dumplings with a decent portion of Chinese stirred noodle for 89kr, what can you ask for more? Nice food and friendly staff! Highly recommended!

column7: The most authentic dumplings I have eaten in Sweden
column9: You might need some gesture interpretation to communicate and the space to sit is very small (and very full during lunch) but the food would be worth much worse. Amazing dumplings! But we warned! the normal dipping sauce is plenty hot, I ordered one of...More

The dumplings are delicious and the meat fillings are juicy and fresh, however the skin of the dumplings are a tad too thick for my liking. Nevertheless, I really enjoyed my meal with the Original sauce dip (onion and soy sauce). The noodles I got...More

column7: Good food, big eat for reasonable money
column9: I liked the dumplings - a variety. Free soup with the meal. Choce of rice or noodles. Inexpensive, but good.

Great fast food place - nice dumplings, and lovely noodles! In my opinion it is the best value for your money in downtown Lund if you're looking to get something fast before rushing off. Very friendly owner.
Dumplings were freshly made and the dipping sauce that came with it was fantastic! For a reasonable price, you get quite a decent portion. Definitely worth a visit if you're in Lund!! :-)

column7: Antligen! Finally got to try this place
column9:
Many friends had told me about this small gem in Lund
Its literally a hole in the way, very tiny place but surprisingly efficient seating for the size
Service is fast, extremely friendly and dumplings are delicious
Lunch is a steal, and you can bring...More
Here you eat dumpling, thats it. 10 is enough for a normal European . Not expensive. Good place to go and eat your first if you haven't taste dumpling before.

column7: Good food but not really Sichuan kitchen
column9: I had expected more of Chengdu taste at this place. Instead I was served a simple but good Asian veggie dish.

Dumplings are ok, but definitely not as good as traditional Chinese jiaozi, which are delicious steamed or fried.
The only option in the place is deep fried ones, which kinda makes it faster to get, but destroys the flavors.
Meat is also adjusted to western...More
Cheap, fast, and extremely tasty. Limited lunch menu, but if you're in the mood for dumplings and noodles, this place is absolutely perfect. Lunch specials run from 11am-3pm. Perfect!

This underground pearl is just amazing, the staff is always very kind and service minded. Their   handmade dumplings taste as if you're in the streets of Bejing. We bought their frozen dumpling and made them at home, they where almost as good as when they...More
The dumplings are freshly fried and very good, the sauces are authentic and delicious and the staff is very friendly. The portions are very big, it's not very cheap but you get a lot for your money.

Had:
best dumplings and soy sauce variety beyond the best in my home country. Great noodles both rice and regular  The simple rice was very flavourful. We tried all the dumplings pork, chicken, vegetarian. The place is small if not taken to go, but very...More

column7: Fantastic value for a different lunch
column9: This is a gem 'hole in the wall' type restaurant, with a superb value lunch special. Fast and very friendly. The pork dumplings are freshly made and bursting with juicy flavour.  Makes a great change from the usual The accompanying noodles could have been a...More
Small place on a corner which can be easy to miss. Very delicious food and fast service. Choose between pork, chicken, veg or mixed dumplings with rice or noodles. Great for lunch!
Finalmente sono riuscita a provarli e sono rimasta veramente innamorata di questo posto, semplice, con cibo buonissimo e secondo me...More
